Author: linux-security@amazon.com
Title: Amazon Linux AMI 2014.03 - ALAS-2019-1224: low priority package update for python-urllib3
Description:
Package updates are available for Amazon Linux AMI that fix the following vulnerabilities:
CVE-2018-20060:
	urllib3 before version 1.23 does not remove the Authorization HTTP header when following a cross-origin redirect (i.e., a redirect that differs in host, port, or scheme). This can allow for credentials in the Authorization header to be exposed to unintended hosts or transmitted in cleartext.
1649153: 
CVE-2018-20060 python-urllib3: Cross-host redirect does not remove Authorization header allow for credential exposure
